# Project Euler 003 - C# Console Application

This workspace contains a C# console application for solving Project Euler problem 003.

## Project Setup Complete

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - C# console application for Project Euler problem 003
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Created using `dotnet new console`
- [x] Customize the Project - Basic "Hello World" template ready for customization  
- [x] Install Required Extensions - No specific extensions required
- [x] Compile the Project - Successfully builds with `dotnet build`
- [x] Create and Run Task - VS Code tasks configured for build and run
- [x] Launch the Project - Ready to run with tasks or `dotnet run`
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md created with project details

## Development Guidelines

- Use VS Code tasks for building and running the project
- The project targets .NET 10.0
- Modify `Program.cs` to implement your Project Euler solution
- Work through each checklist item systematically
- Keep communication concise and focused
- Follow development best practices
